sentences.english: A closely related variety of chalcedony, sard , differs only in the shade of red.
sentences.chinese: 與肉紅玉髓關係密切，不同的只在於紅色色調上。

sentences.english: Muhammad's seal was an engraved Cornelian set in a silver ring.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德的玉璽就是一枚銀環鑲邊的陰雕紅玉髓。

sentences.english: Cornelian has been an important gem in nearly every great civilization.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎在每一個偉大文明中都可以發現紅玉髓的影子。

sentences.english: Agate differs from chalcedony in that the former shows banded structure.
sentences.chinese: 瑪瑙與玉髓的區別在於前者具有條帶狀結構。

sentences.english: Normally faceted as a cabochon it is often used to great effect in both necklaces and bracelets.
sentences.chinese: 通常玉髓切削成多面圓形，用於項鍊和手鐲效果最佳。

sentences.english: Chalcedony is in this guide to list your special.
sentences.chinese: 玉髓是本指南中列出自己的專用。

sentences.english: Some fossil-like structures were also found in the chalcedony.
sentences.chinese: 還發現了鐵礦中玉髓的似生物結構。

definition: jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
